name: actions cluster
description: This cluster provides a standardized way for a Node (typically a Bridge, but could be any Node) to expose action information.

commands.name: Instant Action
commands.description: This command triggers an action (state change) on the involved endpoints.

commands.name: Instant Action With Transition
commands.description: This command triggers an action (state change) on the involved endpoints, with a specified time to transition from the current state to the new state.

commands.name: Start Action
commands.description: This command triggers the commencement of an action on the involved endpoints.

commands.name: Start Action With Duration
commands.description: This command triggers the commencement of an action (with a duration) on the involved endpoints.

commands.name: Stop Action
commands.description: This command stops the ongoing action on the involved endpoints.

commands.name: Pause Action
commands.description: This command pauses an ongoing action.

commands.name: Pause Action With Duration
commands.description: This command pauses an ongoing action with a duration.

commands.name: Resume Action
commands.description: This command resumes a previously paused action.

commands.name: Enable Action
commands.description: This command enables a certain action or automation.

commands.name: Enable Action With Duration
commands.description: This command enables a certain action or automation with a duration.

commands.name: Disable Action
commands.description: This command disables a certain action or automation.

commands.name: Disable Action With Duration
commands.description: This command disables a certain action or automation with a duration.
